# isTargetForDropOperation

**Instance Property**

Specifies whether this row will draw a drop indicator based on the current dragging feedback style.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isTargetForDropOperation: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the row view will draw a drop on indicator based on the current [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTableView/draggingDestinationFeedbackStyle-swift.property].

## Drag and Drop

- **draggingDestinationFeedbackStyle**: Specifies the dragging destination feedback style.
- **indentationForDropOperation**: Defines the amount the drag target for a row should be indented.
